WorkItem.Description: To add support for HTML entities such as © (see: http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_entities.asp).

Comments.Message: Awesome! I spent a lot of time fixing the trademarks, but now that you've fixed it's better. Thanks much!

I am having some trouble with HTML entities. When the html has html entities like & the resulting document can not be opened by Microsoft Word with the error "No error detail available".
If I remove the html entities from the text there is no error.

Hi johannesdr

This was fixed back in May (http://htmltodocx.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/3acb52d70002) - are you using the latest version of the code? I am not getting this problem myself.
